AboutMe.firstbis: .  I worked as a psychomotor therapist for 8 years in medical-social structures, a job that requires curiosity, adaptation, creativity, stress management and good listening and observation skills.
AboutMe.second: I've had a passion for computers and new technologies ever since I was a child. After having started coding in Python as a self-taught person, my taste for programming led me to the path of professional reconversion.
